item.title: SOLVED Weird character model
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

I think you need to add some ints at player.java, can’t remember which ones…

EDIT:

You can try this:

in player.java search for

void appendPlayerAppearance

you should find this:

[code] protected void appendPlayerAppearance(stream str) {
playerProps.currentOffset = 0;
playerProps.writeByte(pGender);
playerProps.writeByte(skulls);

	if (isNpc == false) {

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHat]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] > 1) {
etc…[/code]

Now after: playerProps.writeByte(skulls); add

playerProps.writeByte(hint); playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

Result:

[code] protected void appendPlayerAppearance(stream str) {
playerProps.currentOffset = 0;
playerProps.writeByte(pGender);
playerProps.writeByte(skulls);
playerProps.writeByte(hint);
playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

	if (isNpc == false) {

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHat]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] > 1) {
etc…[/code]

Read full topic
